attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the light of what is going on in portugal and other factors i feel that the current system is not up to scratch it would be beneficial to everyone that these evil people should be taggedso as the powers that be could trace them if they needed to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/peadophiles/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
